alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Guadalupe County; South Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:08AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL LINCOLN... SOUTHWESTERN GUADALUPE AND SOUTHEASTERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM MDT... At 1107 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms between Cedarvale, Duran and Corona, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Duran. This includes Highway 285 between Mile Markers 186 and 191. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Eastern Lincoln County; Guadalupe County; South Central Highlands
